ing.item: (10.7-oz) Totino's Party Pizza Frozen Combination Sausage and Pepperoni Pizza

directions.step:
Heat oven to 425 degrees. Grease cookie sheet or pizza pan. Place frozen pizza on greased cookie sheet; sprinkle remaining ingredients over pizza.
Bake on middle oven rack at 425 for 15-17 minutes or until cheese melts.
TIP: Do not bake this recipe directly on oven rack.
CALORIES: 330 SODIUM: 940MG
CHOLESTEROL: 20MG FAT: 18G
CARBOHYDRATE: 25G SAT: 5G
From <Meals In Minutes>, a Pillsbury Classic Cookbook. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
